snippet: In “John Mellencamp: It’s About You,” the photographer Kurt Markus and his son, Ian, reflect on the disappearance of traditional small-town life as they follow Mr. Mellencamp’s 2009 American tour.
abstract: Stephen Holden reviews documentary film John Mellencamp: It's About You, directed by Kurt Markus and Ian Markus.
lead_paragraph: In “John Mellencamp: It’s About You,” the photographer Kurt Markus and his son, Ian, reflect on the disappearance of traditional small-town life as they follow Mr. Mellencamp’s 2009 American tour.

headline.seo: ‘John Mellencamp: It’s About You,’ by Kurt and Ian Markus - Review
headline.main: On This Rock ’n’ Roll Tour of the Heartland, a Sobering Survey of Old America
